APP_DESCRIPTION: Official mobile application of Big Sales in Hossegor
APP_KEYWORDS: hossegor, big sales, sales, app, application, mobile, map
GEOLOCATION_DESCRIPTION: Find where you are at any time during the event.
NOTIFICATION_DESCRIPTION: Receive promotions or news notifications from your favorite stores.
WAITING_DESCRIPTION: Check out the queue for the biggest stores.
DISCOUNT_DESCRIPTION: Find out about current promotions from your favorite stores to take advantage of them as soon as possible.
FOOD_DESCRIPTION: Eat in specific locations located on the Braderie map.
PARKING_DESCRIPTION: You are lost at the end of your purchases? Thanks to the application you can find your parking lot.
